name: spotify-queue-app
description: Self-hosted Spotify queue management for events

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:admin: cd admin && npx cross-env PORT=3002 BROWSER=none npm start
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
